amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 117-75 as en bloc No. 5: Nos. 116, 117, 118, 123, 124, 126, 127, 128, 129, 130, 131, 133, 136, 137, 138, 139, 140, 141, 142, 144, 145, 146, 147, 148, and 149.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davids (KS) amendments (A008) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 199 (Roll no. 205).
